decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2831304, PL070, 130479/SK052B, received 11/02/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted and other associated structures shall be removed from the site edged red and shown on Drawing No. PL070 within 3 months of the completion of the redevelopment of the site as approved under permission reference 01187/A/S10. Within 3 months of removal [or In the first planting season] following removal of the mobile classrooms, the land shall be reinstated to a quality at least equivalent (or better) than the previous quality.
description: Installation of one temporary building consisting of space for breakfast and after school-clubs
